lineStatuses.reason: DOCKLANDS LIGHT RAILWAY: Saturday 8 and Sunday 9 October, no service between West Ham and Woolwich Arsenal due to improvement and maintenance work. Passengers are advised to use local bus service and the Jubilee line.

disruption.description: DOCKLANDS LIGHT RAILWAY: Saturday 8 and Sunday 9 October, no service between West Ham and Woolwich Arsenal due to improvement and maintenance work. Passengers are advised to use local bus service and the Jubilee line.
disruption.additionalInfo: DLR services will run the following amended routes:Â  Bank - Lewisham; Stratford - Canary Wharf; Bank - Beckton; Stratford International - West Ham; Tower Gateway - Beckton
